definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">the cooldown dosnt prevent the player from using the item for the gun, it is only used for aesthetic</comment><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="item_get_max_damage"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="item_damage"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">the ammo capacity of a gun depends on itsdurability, this is to make the mag size more universal by just changing the gun durability</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block><block type="entity_send_chat" x="-27" y="285"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="item_get_damage"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> current damage of item</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></xml>
